header.changeColorScheme: Title of the color scheme button

home.selectWiki: Placeholder text of the wiki selector
home.enterPageTitle: Placeholder text of the page title input
home.check: Label for the button which performs a check

result.checkLinkTitle: Title for the button that opens the check archive page
result.revisionLinkTitle: Title for the button that opens the checked revision
result.total: Text for the box indicating the total number of checked links
result.ignored: Text for the box indicating the total number of ignored links
result.working: Text for the box indicating the total number of working links
result.broken: Text for the box indicating the total number of broken links
result.errorMessage: Notification text when the website has an error

list.title: Title of the results list page

review.title: Title of the review button
review.select: Placeholder text of the review panel

query.defaultErrorMessage: Default notification text when the API cannot be called

errorMessage.notEmpty: Error message when a required field cannot be empty
